definition: stick/club/cudgel/smart/capable/strong/wonderful/classifier for legs of a relay race

sentences.english: Smaller sizes may be manufactured from equivalent bar stock specifications.
sentences.chinese: 小通徑閥門可能採用等價的棒材材料進行製造。

sentences.english: A superplastic pretreatment method suitable for industral aluminium alloy bars is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種適用於工業鋁合金棒材的超塑預處理方法。

sentences.english: It realizes the automatic counting for bar steel.
sentences.chinese: 實現對棒材的自動計數。

sentences.english: The simulation has made on VMC40N flying shear in Magang.
sentences.chinese: 以馬鋼VMC40N棒材飛剪機爲例進行了仿真。

sentences.english: This grip also comes with stainless steel bar that removes onion smell.
sentences.chinese: 這款握柄同樣用不鏽鋼棒材製成，可去除洋蔥的氣味。

sentences.english: Standard Specification for Aluminum Bronze Sheet, Strip, and Rolled Bar.
sentences.chinese: 鋁青銅中厚板，薄板，帶材和軋製棒材標準規格。

sentences.english: Straightening roller straightening machine through the bars of pressure for them to change, such as straightness.
sentences.chinese: 矯直機通過矯直輥對棒材等進行擠壓使其改變直線度。

sentences.english: An investigation of rolling pressure on metallic uranium rod was made.
sentences.chinese: 本文對金屬鈾棒材軋製壓力進行了研究。

sentences.english: The experiences to use converter gas in heating furnace of the rod rolling mill in Tangshan Iron and Steel Company are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了唐鋼棒材軋鋼加熱爐燒轉爐煤氣的經驗。

sentences.english: Water treatment process and commissioning state of the rod work- shop of Maanshan iron & steel Co. are presented.
sentences.chinese: 主要介紹棒材車間水處理工藝流程及試運行情況。

sentences.english: An operation whereby the surface of a bar is ground without using a lathe.
sentences.chinese: 無須使用車牀就可以研磨棒材表面的操作。

sentences.english: The straightness of the bar shall guarantee a prefect processability .
sentences.chinese: 棒材的直線度必須確保良好的加工性能。

sentences.english: A three-dimensional solution to cover the rolling of narrow sheets and bars is still awaited.
sentences.chinese: 關於窄板和棒材軋製的三維解，目前仍有待於作出。

definition: steel (as raw material)/steel sheets, bars, tubes, ingots, wire etc
